chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: I exhort therefore, that, first of all, supplications, prayers, intercessions, and giving of thanks, be made for all men;
items.plainText: I exhort therefore, that, first of all, supplications, prayers, intercessions, and giving of thanks, be made for all men;

items.text: For kings, and for all that are in authority; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty.
items.plainText: For kings, and for all that are in authority; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty.

items.text: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour;
items.plainText: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour;

items.text: Who will have all men to be saved, and to come unto the knowledge of the truth.
items.plainText: Who will have all men to be saved, and to come unto the knowledge of the truth.

items.text: For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;
items.plainText: For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;

items.text: Who gave himself a ransom for all, to be testified in due time.
items.plainText: Who gave himself a ransom for all, to be testified in due time.

items.text: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher, and an apostle, (I speak the truth in Christ, and lie not;) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity.
items.plainText: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher, and an apostle, (I speak the truth in Christ, and lie not;) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity.

items.text: I will therefore that men pray every where, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and doubting.
items.plainText: I will therefore that men pray every where, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and doubting.

items.text: In like manner also, that women adorn themselves in modest apparel, with shamefacedness and sobriety; not with broided hair, or gold, or pearls, or costly array;
items.plainText: In like manner also, that women adorn themselves in modest apparel, with shamefacedness and sobriety; not with broided hair, or gold, or pearls, or costly array;

items.text: But (which becometh women professing godliness) with good works.
items.plainText: But (which becometh women professing godliness) with good works.

items.text: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection.
items.plainText: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection.

items.text: But I suffer not a woman to teach, nor to usurp authority over the man, but to be in silence.
items.plainText: But I suffer not a woman to teach, nor to usurp authority over the man, but to be in silence.

items.text: For Adam was first formed, then Eve.
items.plainText: For Adam was first formed, then Eve.

items.text: And Adam was not deceived, but the woman being deceived was in the transgression.
items.plainText: And Adam was not deceived, but the woman being deceived was in the transgression.

items.text: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing, if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety.
items.plainText: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing, if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety.
